section.name: Powered By XULUX
section.p: This page contains a list of known projects/companies successfully using XULUX. We would be very interested if you would drop us a note if you are using XULUX with your project and would like to be added to this list.

tr.td: An electronic patient record to be used by all professionals associated with the patient care process. It's goal is to replace hospitals paper records. Also a great sponsor for XULUX, since part of my work time is devoted to XULUX programming..
